attributes.action: get double summer time clock change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Trying to get support to get the clocks changed so we have an extra 2 hours of light in the summer and 1 extra hour in the winter. 

The introduction of Single/Double Summer time (SDST) would not increase the number of daylight hours in each day but it would affect the use of the daylight hours. Read more hear....http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/devon/8581426.stm
